name: Adventurer Kampung
description:
You are an adventurer on a small village. 

Take the available quests, whether it is get rid of slimes, or fight bandits. 

Achieve your dream of becoming a strong adventurer even though you are in a small village (kampung).

Game Control:

Use mouse to navigate what you want to interact with

Credit:
Programming & Art By Me!

Music by:
Minifantasy - Dungeon Audio Pack by Leohpaz

Theo's BGM Collection by TheoAllen
